name: ADO.Network
description: Ado.Network aims to increase adoption by connecting businesses with the blockchain technology. ADO.Network is positioned to redefine the DeFi space with its unique tax mechanisms and liquidity switch. It provides an alternative monetary convention that simplifies the staking process, maximizing the returns that ADO token holders receive. Ado.Network introduced two novel features on Binance Smart Chain as well as unique tokenomics, rewards, and loyalty system. Simply put, Ado.Network is a bear market killer!
